title: Gurman: iOS 16 and watchOS 9 to bring major upgrades at WWDC 2022
content:
In his latest edition of the Power On newsletter, Bloomberg‘s Mark Gurman is bringing more tidbits about iOS 16 and watchOS 9, which he calls “major upgrades.” This is the first time Gurman reports about the upcoming operating systems after Apple announced the WWDC 2022 keynote set to occur on June 6.

more…

The post Gurman: iOS 16 and watchOS 9 to bring major upgrades at WWDC 2022 appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: Bloomberg's Mark Gurman is bringing more tidbits about iOS 16 and watchOS 9, which he calls "major upgrades" coming at WWDC 2022.
